resources.string: Welcome to the Hotel Sayang App!

Welcome to the Hotel Sayang Booking System mobile app, where luxury and convenience converge to redefine your travel experience. Designed for business professionals on the go, families planning spontaneous getaways, and leisure travelers seeking a one-of-a-kind adventure, our app ensures a seamless and personalized journey from start to finish. With a secure authentication feature, you can trust that your information is protected as you effortlessly navigate through our visually appealing layout. Explore the prime location of HotelSayang using our integrated Google Maps feature and discover nearby attractions at your fingertips. The robust database system guarantees the safety and reliability of your data, allowing you to book your stay with confidence.

Comfortable Rooms: Each room at Hotel Sayang is meticulously designed with modern interiors, luxurious bedding, and bathroom amenities. You can expect top-notch comfort in our rooms, ensuring an impeccable stay experience.

Dining: Our restaurant offers a diverse range of culinary options, from international cuisine to authentic local dishes, catering to various tastes. Our bar and lounge areas provide an ideal space for relaxation and socialization.

Meetings and Events: Hotel Sayang boasts versatile meeting rooms, ideal for hosting business meetings, celebrations, weddings, and various events. Our professional team ensures the smooth execution of your events, regardless of their size.

Fitness and Leisure: The hotel features a fitness center and an indoor swimming pool for guests to exercise and unwind. Additionally, we offer spa and massage services to provide the perfect balance of body and mind.

Convenient Location: Hotel Sayang is situated in the heart of Kajang, close to the business district, shopping areas, and tourist attractions. Guests can easily explore all corners of the city, whether for sightseeing or business travel.

Our team is committed to providing excellent service to every guest, ensuring they have an unforgettable stay at Hotel Sayang. We look forward to welcoming you to experience our warm hospitality and high-quality service. Whether you are here for leisure or business, Hotel Sayang will provide you with a home away from home.

Our team, comprising dedicated Information Technology students from UITM Shah Alam, is proud to present Hotel Sayang, our innovative mobile application aimed at enhancing the hotel booking experience. HotelSayang revolutionizes the way users explore and reserve accommodations by offering a user-friendly interface for seamless navigation, personalized bookings, and a dynamic map interface showcasing nearby attractions. The web server-side application, equipped with an admin UI, enhances the accuracy of hotel information, providing users with a comprehensive and trustworthy platform for their hotel reservations.

Check-out Information:

Check-out Time: Please check out on time as per your reservation. If you require a late check-out, kindly click the "Extend Stay" button on the homepage to make a request. We will do our best to accommodate your needs. However, late check-out may incur additional charges, so please inquire in advance.

Bill Verification:

Please carefully review your bill before departure to ensure that all charges are accurate. If you have any questions or need assistance, feel free to contact our front desk staff at any time.

Room Cleanliness and Personal Belongings:

Please ensure you have taken all your personal belongings. Unused items in the room such as food or drinks from the mini-bar and room amenities may result in additional charges.

Key Return:

Kindly return your room key card to the front desk to avoid additional charges and inconvenience. Lost key cards will incur extra fees.

Feedback and Evaluation:

Your feedback is highly valuable to us. Before leaving, please share your thoughts and experiences with our services and accommodations, helping us in our continual improvement.

We hope you had a pleasant stay at our hotel, and we look forward to the opportunity to serve you again in the future. If you have any future travel plans, kindly consider our hotel, where we will be dedicated to serving you.

Should you have any questions or require assistance, please do not hesitate to contact our front desk staff. We wish you a smooth journey ahead!

Best and regards,

Hotel Sayang
